Text:
How to burn on 3DVD:
DVD1:
data_0.bin, data_1.bin, data_2.bin, data_3.bin, data_4.bin, autorun.inf, icon.ico, setup.exe.
DVD2: data_5.bin
DVD3: all remained files.
Si funciona pero solo con el crack que bloquea los DLC.

Please seed this. Downloading torrents is free, seeding is the least you can do for the torrent community.

Leeching is just selfish.

Anyone know where the hell it stores your save games? Recently updated it via another torrent on here and lost all my saves. Followed all the directions I've been told, but the games don't seem to be located in any of the common spots. Not a huge deal, but I wouldn't mind being able to recover them.
